src:
Gedung Kosong Hailai Ancol Terbakar, Damkar: Bekas Area Hiburan
04 Nov 2019, 18:55 by Caesar Akbar, Kukuh S. Wibowo
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta-Kepala Suku Dinas Pemadam Kebakaran dan Penyelamatan Jakarta Utara Satriadi Gunawan memastikan gedung yang terbakar di Jalan Pelabuhan Ratu Nomor 8, Ancol, Pademangan, Jakarta Utara, adalah gedung kosong milik Hailai.
"Itu adalah gedung lama, kosong," ujar Satriadi kepada Tempo, Selasa, 5 November 2019. Seorang petugas pemadam di lokasi kejadian mengatakan gedung tersebut adalah bekas area hiburan.
Berdasarkan informasi yang diterima Tempo, api melalap gedung tersebut sejak Senin malam, 4 November 2019 pukul 23.00 WIB. Hingga Selasa dini hari, 5 November 2019 pukul 01.28 WIB, api masih belum padam.
Berdasarkan pantauan Tempo, asap tebal masih mengepul di lokasi kejadian. Petugas pemadam tampak berjibaku melakukan pemadaman dari berbagai sisi. Dilaporkan, 16 unit pemadam dikerahkan untuk memadamkan si jago merah.
Satriadi mengatakan pemadaman masih berlangsung dan relatif tak ada hambatan. "Tidak ada kendala," ujar dia. Hingga kini, penyebab dan kerugian akibat kebakaran tersebut masih diselidiki.
text:
Hailai Ancol Empty Building Burned, Damkar: Former Entertainment Area
04 Nov 2019, 18:55 by Caesar Akbar, Kukuh S. Wibowo
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Head of the North Jakarta Fire and Rescue Agency, Satriadi Gunawan, confirmed that the burning building on Jalan Pelabuhan Ratu Number 8, Ancol, Pademangan, North Jakarta, was an empty building owned by Hailai.
"It is an old building, empty," Satriadi told Tempo, Tuesday, November 5, 2019. A firefighter at the scene said the building was a former entertainment area.
Based on information received by Tempo, the fire engulfed the building since Monday night, November 4, 2019 at 23:00 WIB. Until Tuesday morning, 5 November 2019 at 01.28 WIB, the fire was still not extinguished.
Based on Tempo's observation, thick smoke was still rising at the scene. Firefighters seemed to be struggling to do blackouts from various sides. Reportedly, 16 fire units were deployed to extinguish the red rooster.
Satriadi said the blackouts were still ongoing and there were relatively no obstacles. "There are no obstacles," he said. Until now, the causes and losses from the fire are still being investigated.
